sen.j: 山科 言縄（やましな ときなお、天保6年6月20日 (旧暦)（1835年7月15日） - 大正5年（1916年）11月6日）は、江戸時代末期の公家。
sen.e: Tokinao YAMASHINA (November 6, 1916 to July 15, 1835,) was a Kuge (court noble) in the late Edo period.
Tokinao YAMASHINA (July 15, 1835 to November 6, 1916) was a Kuge (court noble) in the late Edo period.
sen.cmt: 生年・没年の表記が逆になっています。
sen.e: Tokinao YAMASHINA (July 15, 1835 to November 6, 1916) was a Kuge (court noble) in the late Edo period.
He was a Senior Second Rank earl.
He was a Shonii (Senior Second Rank) earl.
sen.cmt: 官位の表記を用語統一リストに従って修正しました。
sen.e: He was a Shonii (Senior Second Rank) earl.

sen.j: 明治17年の華族令で、伯爵に任ぜられた。
sen.e: He was ranked as an earl because of the Noble Family Ordinance in 1884.
He was ranked as an earl because of the Noble Family Ordinance in 1884.
He was ranked as an earl because of the Noble Family Ordinance in 1884.
He was well versed in costumes etc.
He was well versed in costumes etc.
He was well versed in costumes etc.

sen.j: 三男の杉渓言長は、分家杉渓家の祖。
sen.e: His third son Kotonaga SUGITANI was the originator of the branch family called the SUGITANI family.
His third son Kotonaga SUGITANI was the originator of the branch family called the Sugitani family.
sen.cmt: 家名は頭文字のみを大文字にします。
sen.e: His third son Kotonaga SUGITANI was the originator of the branch family called the Sugitani family.
